Dialogue.text: Good morning, Sector 7! Today is the 3rd day of Gnarl. In eight days, Overlord Aso will be making his historic trip.

Dialogue415.text: It'd take something like a pandemic to stop that trip.

Dialogue424.text: In other news, the outbreak of the CX-6 virus has been declared a pandemic in Sector 6.

Dialogue433.text: While most will recover, many experience long-term side effects and even death. The elderly are among the highest risk groups.
